item.description: I’m a pretty big fan of Sublime Text (v3), will blog more about my setup details. But this morning i really missed the Control+W to delete the first word on the left side, so i found this Solution: Sublime Text -> Preferences -> Key Bindings - User: 1 2 3 [ { "keys": ["ctrl+w"], "command": "delete_word", "args": {"forward": false, "sub_words": true}}, ] An that’s it, you can now delete words with Control+W ðŸ™‚
